text: Diego Martín Rossi Marachlian (born 5 March 1998) is a Uruguayan professional footballer who plays as a winger or a forward for Major League Soccer club Columbus Crew and the Uruguay national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Peñarol 2015–16 Uruguayan Primera División 6 1 — 2One appearance each in Copa Libertadores and Copa Sudamericana. 0 1Appearance(s) in league playoffs. 1 9 2 2016 6 1 — — — 6 1 2017 31 10 — 3Appearances in Copa Libertadores. 0 2 0 36 10 Total 43 12 0 0 5 0 3 1 51 13 Los Angeles FC 2018 Major League Soccer 32 12 4 5 — 1Appearance(s) in the MLS Cup Playoffs. 0 37 17 2019 34 16 3 1 — 2 1 39 18 2020 19Includes three appearances and five goals in MLS is Back Tournament group stage. 14 — 5Appearances in CONCACAF Champions League. 2 2Appearances in MLS is Back Tournament knockout stage. 2 26 18 2021 19 6 0 0 — 0 0 19 6 Total 104 48 7 6 5 2 5 3 121 59 Fenerbahçe (loan) 2021–22 Süper Lig 31 6 2 0 6Appearances in UEFA Europa League. 0 — 39 6 Fenerbahçe 2022–23 33 4 6 0 12Ten appearances in UEFA Europa League and two appearances in UEFA Champions League. 0 — 51 4 Total 64 10 8 0 18 0 0 0 90 10 Columbus Crew 2023 Major League Soccer 1 0 0 0 — 0 0 1 0 Career total 213 70 15 6 28 2 8 4 263 82 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Uruguay 2022 4 1 2023 3 0 Total 7 1 :Scores and results list Uruguay's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Rossi goal. List of international goals scored by Diego Rossi No. Date Venue Opponent Score Result Competition 1 11 June 2022 Estadio Centenario, Montevideo, Uruguay 5–0 5–0 Friendly ==Honours== Peñarol *Primera División: 2015–16, 2017 Los Angeles FC *Supporters' Shield: 2019 Fenerbahçe *Turkish Cup: 2022–23 Uruguay Youth *South American Youth Football Championship: 2017 Individual *MLS All-Star: 2019, 2021 *MLS is Back Tournament Golden Boot: 2020 *MLS is Back Tournament Young Player of the Tournament: 2020 *MLS is Back Tournament Best XI: 2020 *MLS Golden Boot: 2020 *MLS Young Player of the Year: 2020 *MLS Best XI: 2020 *CONCACAF Champions League Team of the Tournament: 2020 *Best MLS Player ESPY Award: 2021 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Association football forwards Category:Uruguayan footballers
